source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim)
- **New Data:** where an EmployeeID in the source does not exist as an EmployeeID in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on EmployeeID in source and EmployeeID in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeID in the target exists but the same EmployeeID doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View specialism_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build specialism_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW specialism_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Staff_Number IS NULL
        THEN first(T7.SpecialismID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as SpecialismID, -- surrogate key
    FIRST(T3.EmployeeID) AS EmployeeID,
    T1.Qualification_Name as Qualification,
    T1.Proficien AS Proficiency,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(FIRST(T3.EmployeeID),'.'), IFNULL(T1.Qualification_Name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Proficien,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN FIRST(T3.EmployeeID) = first(T7.EmployeeID) AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(FIRST(T3.EmployeeID),'.'), IFNULL(T1.Qualification_Name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Proficien,'.'))) <> first(T7.RowID)    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T7.EmployeeID) IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN FIRST(T3.EmployeeID) IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_specialisms T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Staff_Number = T3.EmployeeNumber and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim T7 ON T1.Staff_Number = T7.EmployeeID
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T3.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Qualification_Name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Proficien,'.'))) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.EmployeeID IS NULL -- new employee
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T3.EmployeeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
)

    AND
        T1.Staff_Number IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY T1.Staff_Number, T1.Qualification_Name, T1.Proficien

;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **specialism_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View specialism_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW specialism_dim_changed_rows

    AS

Select 
    SpecialismID,
    EmployeeID,
    Qualification,
    Proficiency,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
From specialism_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    SpecialismID,
    EmployeeID,
    Qualification,
    Proficiency,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim
WHERE SpecialismID IN (SELECT SpecialismID FROM specialism_dim_new WHERE SpecialismID IS NULL);

# View specialism_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. SpecialismID from specialism_dim), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim AS Target
USING specialism_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.SpecialismID = Target.SpecialismID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new employee_hr_hierarchy_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SpecialismID NULLS LAST) AS SpecialismID,
    EmployeeID,
    Qualification,
    Proficiency,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.specialism_dim;
